definition: Burns (name)/Nicholas Burns (1956-), US diplomat, Under-secretary at US State Department from 2005
father's elder brother/senior/paternal elder uncle/eldest of brothers/respectful form of address/Count, third of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

pinyin: Luo2 bo2 te4 · Bo2 en1 si1

sentences.english: What is your name besides Burns?
Arthur F. Burns and Wesley C. Mitchell provided the classical definition.
sentences.chinese: 阿瑟楼角伯恩斯和韦斯利米切尔提供了经典的定义。

sentences.english: Burns announced negotiations on reprocessing would begin before the end of next month.
sentences.chinese: 伯恩斯宣布对再加工的协商将会于下个月底开始。

sentences.english: There can be no question that this was a personal attack against Murray.
sentences.chinese: 所以这不可能是伯恩斯对罗斯巴德的个人攻击。
曾任美国驻俄大使的伯恩斯在发言中强调了三点。

sentences.english: Attendance by Burns will mark a shift in U. S. policy.
sentences.chinese: 伯恩斯参加谈判标志著美国政策的转变。

sentences.english: The record for Burns was broken in the 1996 (nineteen ninety-six) World Championships.
sentences.chinese: 伯恩斯的纪录在1996年的世界冠军赛中被刷新。

sentences.english: In addition to his musicals , Bernstein has written symphonies and ballet music.
sentences.chinese: 除音乐喜剧外，伯恩斯坦还写过交响曲和芭蕾舞曲。

sentences.english: Bernstein later directed students at the music center.
sentences.chinese: 后来伯恩斯坦在音乐中心指导学生。

sentences.english: Burns also cited the global nature of the U.S.-Japan alliance.
sentences.chinese: 伯恩斯还谈到美日同盟关系的全球意义。

sentences.english: Burns said landslides happen all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 伯恩斯说世界各地都会发生山体滑坡。

sentences.english: Bernstein's best-known work is West Side Story.
sentences.chinese: 伯恩斯坦最著名的作品是《西边的故事》。

sentences.english: He doesn't own Dell stock. Bernstein doesn't do business with Dell.
sentences.chinese: 伯恩斯坦和我所压的宝稍有不同。

sentences.english: Ironically, Rothbard and Burns had known each other since childhood.
sentences.chinese: 讽刺的是，罗斯巴德从孩童时期就认识伯恩斯。

sentences.english: And he said Berns managed to accomplish that.
sentences.chinese: 他说，伯恩斯已经做到了。

sentences.english: Jennifer Burns says most of the sofas and chairs in these rooms are upholstered.
sentences.chinese: 詹妮弗伯恩斯说的沙发和椅子在这些房间大多是装饰。

definition: becquerel (unit of radioactivity, symbol Bq)/abbr. for 貝克勒爾|贝克勒尔[bei4 ke4 le4 er3]
